Olympics](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/opals-star-shattered-after-injury-in-final-warm-up-clash-knocks-her-out-of-olympics/view/)Australia's women's basketball team calls up reserve Amy Atwell after star guard Rebecca Allen is ruled out of the Paris Games with a hamstring injury. - [Who will stay and who will go? Eels roster under microscope amid Ryles’ impending arrival](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/who-will-stay-and-who-will-go-eels-roster-under-microscope-amid-ryles-impending-arrival/view/)The struggling Parramatta Eels are set for a massive clean-out when incoming coach Jason Ryles arrives in November. - [Matildas to again call on ‘never say die’ spirit after nightmare start to Olympic campaign](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/matildas-to-again-call-on-never-say-die-spirit-after-nightmare-start-to-olympic-campaign/view/) [via](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/matildas-to-again-call-on-never-say-die-spirit-after-nightmare-start-to-olympic-campaign/) [theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/sport/article/2024/jul/26/matildas-australia-football-team-paris-olympics-group-b-football)Australia will have to do it the hard way to progress from Group B at Paris 2024 but have shown that they are at their best with backs to the wallRarely do the Matildas do things the easy way. The team’s motto is not “never say die” for nothing. But a heavy defeat to Germany in Marseille was hardly the ideal start to an Olympic campaign, especially after stated pre-tournament aspirations of a podium position following consecutive fourth-place finishes at major tournaments. Loss - ['Opportunistic' try from kick-off puts Fiji ahead of Ireland](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/opportunistic-try-from-kick-off-puts-fiji-ahead-of-ireland/view/)Waisea Nacuqu scores the match-winning try for Fiji over Ireland in the men's rugby sevens at Paris 2024. © International Olympic Committee - [Crunch time for Ricciardo as Pérez call looms; Verstappen set for penalty: Belgium burning questions](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/crunch-time-for-ricciardo-as-prez-call-looms-verstappen-set-for-penalty-belgium-burning-questions/view/)Oscar Piastri arrives in Belgium as a grand prix winner for the first time, and now that the celebratory Big Mac has settled, he can turn his attention to doubling his victory tally. - [England captain Ben Stokes backs teammate Mark Wood to topple Mitchell Starc’s record for fastest Test delivery](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/england-captain-ben-stokes-backs-teammate-mark-wood-to-topple-mitchell-starcs-record-for-fastest-test-delivery/view/)England captain Ben Stokes believes Mark Wood can become the first bowler to be clocked in excess of 100mph (161km/h) during a Test match following his Durham teammate’s thrilling display at Trent Bridge. - [The big ‘difference’ between Team USA and everyone else... and why it could spark Olympic boilover](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/the-big-difference-between-team-usa-and-everyone-else-and-why-it-could-spark-olympic-boilover/view/)LeBron James. Steph Curry. Joel Embiid. Kevin Durant. - [2025 Vegas season opener set for unprecedented mass exposure in massive win for NRL](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/2025-vegas-season-opener-set-for-unprecedented-mass-exposure-in-massive-win-for-nrl/view/)The NRL will reportedly attempt to lure NFL legend Tom Brady into the broadcasting booth for next year’s season opener in Las Vegas. - [Fresh ‘sabotage’ claim in Olympic scandal; Nadal’s worrying injury setback — Olympics Daily](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/fresh-sabotage-claim-in-olympic-scandal-nadals-worrying-injury-setback-olympics-daily/view/)There are fresh claims British Olympian Charlotte Dujardin was sabotaged on the eve of the Paris Games after footage of her alleged animal abuse went public. - [‘Vengeance’: Why Blues loss was Port’s ‘shock’ turning point... for all the wrong reasons](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/vengeance-why-blues-loss-was-ports-shock-turning-point-for-all-the-wrong-reasons/view/)Port Adelaide has vengeance on its mind as it travels to Melbourne to play Carlton for the second time this season in a blockbuster meeting at Marvel Stadium. - [Matildas haunted by history in Olympic loss to Germany](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/matildas-haunted-by-history-in-olympic-loss-to-germany/view/)Twenty-four years ago, the Matildas lost to Germany 3-0 in their opening Olympics group game. Will history continue to repeat itself in Paris? - [‘Red hot’ Manly’s title credentials go on line in blockbuster as question marks loom](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/red-hot-manlys-title-credentials-go-on-line-in-blockbuster-as-question-marks-loom/view/)Manly’s talented roster, and recent purple patch of form, has some believing Anthony Seibold’s side have an outside chance of winning the 2024 premiership — but not everyone is buying the hype. - [From being the only girl in a boys' team to playing for the Matildas, Zoe reflects on how much has changed](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/from-being-the-only-girl-in-a-boys-team-to-playing-for-the-matildas-zoe-reflects-on-how-much-has-changed/view/)Tasmanian Zoe Nolan earned a place on the Matildas in the team's early days. After breaking her shin bone, she had to give up her training gear for another player to use. - [Paris Olympics 2024: Why Team USA is no lock to win gold in basketball, roster, who is playing for Team USA, NBA experience](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/paris-olympics-2024-why-team-usa-is-no-lock-to-win-gold-in-basketball-roster-who-is-playing-for-team-usa-nba-experience/view/)LeBron James. Steph Curry. Joel Embiid. Kevin Durant. - [Cate Campbell says call on swim coach was 'athlete led'](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/cate-campbell-says-call-on-swim-coach-was-athlete-led/view/)Former Aussie Olympic swimmer Cate Campbell discusses the decision to allow swimming coach Michael Palfrey to stay on at Paris 2024. © International Olympic Committee - [Officials make decision on swim coach after ’un-Australian’ act, apology: LIVE](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/officials-make-decision-on-swim-coach-after-un-australian-act-apology-live/view/)Embattled Australian team swim coach Michael Palfrey will stay in Paris after the Dolphins convinced head coach Rohan Taylor not to send him home. - [Early Swanson double gives USWNT comfortable win over Zambia in Olympic opener](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/early-swanson-double-gives-uswnt-comfortable-win-over-zambia-in-olympic-opener/view/) [via](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/early-swanson-double-gives-uswnt-comfortable-win-over-zambia-in-olympic-opener/) [theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/football/article/2024/jul/25/early-swanson-double-gives-uswnt-comfortable-win-over-zambia-in-olympic-opener)Group B: USA 3-0 ZambiaEmma Hayes wins first competitive match as US coachMallory Swanson scored a pair of goals just moments apart in the first half and the United States opened their Olympics campaign with a 3-0 victory Thursday night over Zambia, giving new coach Emma Hayes a win in her first major tournament with the team. Trinity Rodman also scored for the US, who are hoping to add a record fifth gold medal to their Olympic collection.
